projects.name: Job Dundho
projects.description: Job Dundho is the ultimate job portal for any job aspirant to find any type of job. It has a nice UI/UX so navigation through the site is a breeze. It also comes with a powerful filtering system so one can find any job easily.

projects.name: Anime India
projects.description: Anime India is a discussion forum web application to discuss things related to anime. It has features like an authentication system, post creation, discussion thread, custom profile, and role-based control. The backend was built using the Django framework and frontend using the Bootstrap framework.

projects.name: Resume Ranker
projects.description: It is a web application that allows the recruiter to easily filter out resumes based on resume score. The backend was built using the Flask framework. It has features like an authentication system, an NLP model to extract relevant content, and a file parsing system.
